job_details.Functieomschrijving:
NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)
     * Full-time
     * Level of experience: Professional
     * What we promise 1: Contributing to one of a kind projects
     * Organisation: Central Business Support
     * Region: The Netherlands
     * What we ask of you 3: An entrepreneurial spirit
     * What we ask of you 1: A good command of Dutch
     * Disciplines: Other
     * What we promise 2: Plenty of room for personal development
     * What we promise 3: Being part of the energy transition
     * What we ask of you 2: A pro-active attitude
       Company Description
       Working at Boskalis is about creating new horizons and sustainable solutions. In a world where population growth, an increase of global trade, demand for (new) energy and climate change are driving forces, we challenge you to make your mark in finding innovative and relevant solutions for complex infrastructural and marine projects.
       Job Description
       Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date.
       At Boskalis we are at the forefront of integrating cutting-edge AI technologies into our (business) solutions. We leverage the power of the Microsoft OpenAI services to develop innovative products that meet our internal customers' evolving needs. Your job can be characterized as follows:
     * Work in a startup like team inside a big company.
     * Implement the newest technologies in (Azure) OpenAI.
     * Work in a dynamic team where you can quickly make an impact by using LLMs to transform how people work.
     * You like keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs).
       Join us if you're passionate about making a significant impact in the tech world of Boskalis with your AI and .NET skills.
       Your responsibilities as .NET software engineer
     * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
       Your qualities and experience
       You can move ahead as a .NET software engineer if you have:
     * A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
     * Strong proficiency in .NET Framework, .NET Core, and C# programming.
     * Experience with Microsoft Azure and its AI services (Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, etc.).
     * Solid understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
     * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a team environment.
       Qualifications
       What you can expect
     * A dynamic environment: A job that allows you to collaborate with a talented team of experts from different backgrounds and contribute to making a significant impact.
     * Rewarding conditions:A competitive salary and much more, including holiday allowance, holiday entitlement of 26 days (based on a full-time contract) and a number of collective scheduled days off, a non-contributory pension scheme, collective schemes such as company health insurance and travel allowance.
     * Career development: We offer you plenty of opportunities to bring out the best in yourself for example through (online) courses at our Boskalis academy.
     * The Boskalis campus:Experience the unique Boskalis vibe at our Papendrecht site, complete with restaurants, sports field, and a wharf where our vessels dock. We offer a state-of-the-art auditorium, brainstorming rooms, experience center for client meetings, and a barista corner where you can connect with colleagues.
     * Young Boskalis: Are you under 36? Come and join Young Boskalis! Have fun and join in social and sports activities ranging from pub quizzes to yoga, bootcamps and an annual sailing boat race. Networking and knowledge sharing are a vital part of Young Boskalis as well.
       Extra information
     * Your team: You will be part of a development team of in total 15 colleagues with 5 specialised in .Net.
     * Where you will work: For office-based roles, in consultation with your manager and your team, you work partly at home and partly in the office.
     * Full/part-time job: The position of .NET software engineer is a full-time job (40 hours a week). 32 or 36 hours per week is negotiable.
     * Next steps: Apply easily by completing the online application form. Interviews are held online or in the office. Once it's clear we're a good match, we'll make you an offer - and look forward to welcoming you to the company.
       Additional Information
       Please apply before May 31, 2024.
       Disclaimer for recruitment and selection agencies
       We don't accept any unsolicited applications or CVs from recruitment- and selection agencies.
       LI-RSM
job_details.full_text:
NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)

NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)
     * Full-time
     * Level of experience: Professional
     * What we promise 1: Contributing to one of a kind projects
     * Organisation: Central Business Support
     * Region: The Netherlands
     * What we ask of you 3: An entrepreneurial spirit
     * What we ask of you 1: A good command of Dutch
     * Disciplines: Other
     * What we promise 2: Plenty of room for personal development
     * What we promise 3: Being part of the energy transition
     * What we ask of you 2: A pro-active attitude
       Company Description
       Working at Boskalis is about creating new horizons and sustainable solutions. In a world where population growth, an increase of global trade, demand for (new) energy and climate change are driving forces, we challenge you to make your mark in finding innovative and relevant solutions for complex infrastructural and marine projects.
       Job Description

You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date.
       At Boskalis we are at the forefront of integrating cutting-edge AI technologies into our (business) solutions. We leverage the power of the Microsoft OpenAI services to develop innovative products that meet our internal customers' evolving needs. Your job can be characterized as follows:

     * You like keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs).
       Join us if you're passionate about making a significant impact in the tech world of Boskalis with your AI and .NET skills.

     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.

     * Rewarding conditions:A competitive salary and much more, including holiday allowance, holiday entitlement of 26 days (based on a full-time contract) and a number of collective scheduled days off, a non-contributory pension scheme, collective schemes such as company health insurance and travel allowance.

We offer a state-of-the-art auditorium, brainstorming rooms, experience center for client meetings, and a barista corner where you can connect with colleagues.

     * Full/part-time job: The position of .NET software engineer is a full-time job (40 hours a week). 32 or 36 hours per week is negotiable.
     * Next steps: Apply easily by completing the online application form. Interviews are held online or in the office. Once it's clear we're a good match, we'll make you an offer - and look forward to welcoming you to the company.
       Additional Information
       Please apply before May 31, 2024.
       Disclaimer for recruitment and selection agencies

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services using LLMs and Microsoft OpenAI services. It involves integrating AI models into .NET applications, focusing on user-facing systems and leveraging generative AI technologies, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

evidence.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications
evidence.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand how AI solutions fit within existing business applications and processes.

evidence.phrase: develop innovative products that meet our internal customers' evolving needs
evidence.justification: This highlights the requirement to understand and address the needs of internal customers, a key aspect of business understanding.

evidence.phrase: transform how people work
evidence.justification: This implies a focus on improving business processes and user workflows through AI, demonstrating business acumen.

evidence.phrase: building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services
evidence.justification: This broadly covers the creation and refinement of AI models for specific applications.

evidence.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms
evidence.justification: Directly refers to the process of incorporating AI models into software.

evidence.phrase: Implement the newest technologies in (Azure) OpenAI
evidence.justification: Implies working with and potentially fine-tuning or adapting generative models provided by OpenAI services.

evidence.phrase: using LLMs to transform how people work
evidence.justification: Specifically mentions Large Language Models (LLMs), a core component of generative AI modeling.

evidence.phrase: You like keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs)
evidence.justification: Indicates a need to stay current with generative AI and LLM advancements, which involves understanding and potentially adapting models.

evidence.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
evidence.justification: Suggests working with specialists who develop and refine AI models, and then integrating these models.

evidence.phrase: Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI
evidence.justification: Clearly defines the role as a software engineer with a specialization.

evidence.phrase: building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services
evidence.justification: Involves the creation and enhancement of software applications that utilize AI.

evidence.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications
evidence.justification: Focuses on embedding AI capabilities within existing .NET software.

evidence.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications
evidence.justification: Highlights core software engineering concerns like scalability, efficiency, and integration.

evidence.phrase: responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date
evidence.justification: Includes traditional software maintenance tasks.

evidence.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
evidence.justification: Directly lists core software development responsibilities for AI-enhanced applications.

evidence.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
evidence.justification: Covers essential aspects of robust software development.

evidence.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
evidence.justification: Standard software development practices.

evidence.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks
evidence.justification: Indicates a need to keep up with both AI and software framework advancements.

evidence.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient
evidence.justification: Scalability and efficiency are key concerns in production environments, often managed through MLOps practices.

evidence.phrase: Implement the newest technologies in (Azure) OpenAI.
evidence.justification: Deploying and managing services like Azure OpenAI involves operational considerations.

evidence.phrase: Work in a dynamic team where you can quickly make an impact by using LLMs to transform how people work.
evidence.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the emphasis on 'making an impact' and 'transforming how people work' suggests a focus on production deployment and operational efficiency.

evidence.phrase: Experience with Microsoft Azure and its AI services (Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, etc.).
evidence.justification: Azure services are integral to deploying and managing AI models in production.

evidence.phrase: You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists
evidence.justification: Indicates the need for collaboration with technical peers.

evidence.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
evidence.justification: Highlights collaboration with a specific group of experts.

evidence.phrase: excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a team environment.
evidence.justification: Explicitly mentions teamwork.

evidence.phrase: contribute to making a significant impact.
evidence.justification: Implies effective communication to achieve impact within a team.

evidence.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks
evidence.justification: Requires continuous learning in a rapidly evolving field.

evidence.phrase: You like keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs).
evidence.justification: Directly states the need to stay current with new technologies.

evidence.phrase: Plenty of room for personal development
evidence.justification: Suggests a company culture that supports learning and growth.

evidence.phrase: (online) courses at our Boskalis academy.
evidence.justification: Indicates opportunities for formal learning and development.

evidence.phrase: building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services
evidence.justification: Optimization implies problem-solving to improve performance.

evidence.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient
evidence.justification: Addressing scalability and efficiency are problem-solving tasks.

evidence.phrase: Excellent problem-solving skills
evidence.justification: Explicitly stated requirement.

evidence.phrase: transform how people work
evidence.justification: Suggests finding practical solutions to improve existing workflows.

evidence.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
evidence.justification: Security and compliance touch upon responsible AI development.

evidence.phrase: An entrepreneurial spirit
evidence.justification: Directly points to an innovative and proactive mindset.

evidence.phrase: A pro-active attitude
evidence.justification: Indicates taking initiative and ownership.

evidence.phrase: Work in a startup like team inside a big company.
evidence.justification: Suggests an environment where innovation and taking ownership are encouraged.

evidence.phrase: make your mark
evidence.justification: Implies a desire to contribute significantly and take ownership of one's work.

evidence.phrase: make an impact
evidence.justification: Suggests a drive to achieve results and take ownership of those outcomes.
